Package ltl2rabin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Automaton<T,U>
    This is the abstract base class for all automata.
    Automaton.State<R,S>
    The abstract base class for all states.
    Automaton.Transition<S extends Automaton.State,L>
    A transition has two states (from and to) and a letter.
    AutomatonFactory<F,A,L>
    The abstract base class for all factories that build Automatons.
    GDRA
    A GDRA object represents a generalized deterministic Rabin automaton.
    GDRA.State  
    GDRA.Transition  
    GDRAFactory
    This class creates objects that can create a GDRA out of the Result of an LTLFactory.
    HanoiFormat
    This class provides static functions that convert Automata to Strings in the Hanoi Omega Automaton Format (hoaf).
    Main  
    MojmirAutomaton<T,L>
    This class describes a Mojmir automaton.
    MojmirAutomaton.State<R,S>  
    MojmirAutomatonFactory<F>
    This class is the base class for Factories that create MojmirAutomaton objects.
    MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromFormula  
    MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromString
    This factory can create a MojmirAutomaton from a String.
    Pair<F,S>
    A 2-tuple
    RabinAutomaton<T,U extends Collection>
    Base class for Rabin Automata.
    RabinAutomaton.State<R,S>  
    RabinAutomatonFactory<F,A,L>  
    Slave
    Slaves are Rabin automata that are constructed for a G-subformula.
    Slave.State  
    Slave.Transition  
    SlaveFromFormulaFactory
    A SlaveFromFormulaFactory can create a Slave from an LTL object, using its alphabet.
    SlaveFromMojmirFactory
    A factory of this type will create Slaves (which are state rankings for Mojmir automatons) out of a given MojmirAutomaton.
